page.title: 04Farming cont
page.content: Some of these fields have odd names like_Owld Dicks Field,Long Dicks Field,Taylor's and Peets.The ditches drain the surplus water into the back drain.When the corn has been dried in the bins it goes to make animal food. The potatoes and other vegatables go to market to be sold.Nowadays they use tractors for ploughing and working the land to make it ready for the crops.they have a seeder for sowing carrots,onions,beetroot etc.they also have a carrot and potato harvester.In the old days they had no tractors_ all the work was done by horses.My Nan says some of the changes are for the better but some are for the worse.Only a few people are needed to work a farm.They like farming but it is a 7 day week job.
